oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from secretary of the Tennessee Union Soldiers' Andersonville Monument Association Association
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to H.W. Summer of Wartburg, TN from Alexander Eckel, Sec. of the Tennessee Union Soldiers' Andersonville Monument Association acknowledging receipt of a check for $150 from H.W. Summer for a monument at Andersonville, Ga., site of the notorious Confederate prison camp at which many East Tennessee Union soldiers were imprisoned.
